means: （尤指飞行旅程中的）中途停留

sentence.Network_en: The Sunday flights will make a stopover in Paris.
sentence.Network_cn: 周日的航班将中途经停巴黎。

sentence.Network_en: We had a two-day stopover in Fiji on the way to Australia.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们去澳大利亚时中途在斐济停留了两天。

sentence.Network_en: During our two - day stopover in Bangkok we saw most of the sights.
sentence.Network_cn: 在曼谷中途停留的两天里,我们游览了大部分景点.

entry.def: A stopover is a short stay in a place in between parts of a journey.

example.ex: The President had talks during a brief stopover in Lisbon with his Portuguese counterpart...
example.tran: 总统在里斯本作短暂停留期间和葡萄牙总统进行了会谈。

example.ex: The Sunday flights will make a stopover in Paris.
example.tran: 周日的航班将中途经停巴黎。

means.word_mean: 1. a stopping place on a journey;

sentences.sentence: "there is a stopover to change planes in Chicago"

means.word_mean: 2. a brief stay in the course of a journey;

sentences.sentence: "they made a stopover to visit their friends"

auth_sentence.content: Hunting and the destruction of stopover sites on the birds' migration route have caused the drop in numbers.
auth_sentence.res_content: Hunting and the destruction of stopover sites on the birds' migration route have caused the drop in numbers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Hunting and the destruction of stopover sites on the birds' migration route have caused the drop in numbers.

auth_sentence.content: Most succumbed to malaria and other diseases picked up during a stopover in the port of Jakarta.
auth_sentence.res_content: Most succumbed to malaria and other diseases picked up during a stopover in the port of Jakarta.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Most succumbed to malaria and other diseases picked up during a stopover in the port of Jakarta.

auth_sentence.content: So, having these stopover spots is pretty critical for the overall breeding success along with these different migratory species.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: So, having these stopover spots is pretty critical for the overall breeding success along with these different migratory species.

means.word_mean: (尤指飞行旅程中的)中途停留

sentences.en: We had a three-day stopover in Hawaii.
sentences.cn: 我们在夏威夷停留了三天。

sentences.en: We had our tickets checked at each stopover.
sentences.cn: 每次中途停留都有人给我们检票。

sentences.en: During our two-day stopover in Bangkok we saw most of the sights.
sentences.cn: 在曼谷中途停留的两天里 ，我们游览了大部分景点。
